artist: Artist: Veronika Schäpers; Artist: Shimizu Yoshinori
description: white padded cotton case with Japanese embroidery down front in white; ties with Japanese knot; thin white book bound with string; Japanese text on decorated paper; comes with essay in English and color photograph; also includes small white silk talisman in paper bag; lender's archive #107
markings: Numbered in pencil both on German and Japanese colophon page: 9; orange chop mark on colophon page
medium: Hand-printed rubber stamps; letterpress; with Japanese binding of paper cord and kozo-gampi cardboard, and cotton sheath with embroidered title and silk cord
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Signed in pencil on colophon page: Veronika Schäpers
title: A Safe Method to Pass University Entrance Exams in the Subject of Japanese
